data.name: Leaf Blower Revolution - Materials Pack
data.detailed_description:
Upgrade your leaf-blowing tools with the Materials Pack for Leaf Blower Revolution!

  • 400 Gems
  • +50 more Gems after claiming the daily reward
  • 500 of all materials instantly
  • +1000 of all materials after claiming the daily reward
  • 25 of all essences instantly
  • +50 of all essences after claiming the daily reward
  • Material storage increased by 10,000
  • Support the developer
data.about_the_game:
Upgrade your leaf-blowing tools with the Materials Pack for Leaf Blower Revolution!

  • 400 Gems
  • +50 more Gems after claiming the daily reward
  • 500 of all materials instantly
  • +1000 of all materials after claiming the daily reward
  • 25 of all essences instantly
  • +50 of all essences after claiming the daily reward
  • Material storage increased by 10,000
  • Support the developer
data.short_description: Upgrade your leaf-blowing tools with the Materials Pack for Leaf Blower Revolution! Get 1000 of all materials, 50 of all essences, and 50 more Gems per daily reward. Instantly get 500 of all materials, 25 of all essences, and 400 gems.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
